set.name: Super Best!! Duema Fest Pack: The Rise of Kings Series Volume 3

property.name: Rules
property.value: {STAR EVOLUTION} Put on one of your RexStars or Light creatures. (When this creature would leave, the top card leaves instead.) {INVASION}-Light RexStars that costs 4 or more (When one of your Light RexStars that costs 4 or more attacks, you may put this creature from your hand onto it.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures and tap it. At the start of your opponent's next turn, that creature doesn't untap.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ When you put this creature, put one of your shields into your graveyard. Then draw a card. ■ After this creature attacks, destroy this creature.

property.value: {GUARDMAN} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature from your other creatures to this creature.) ■ This creature can't attack. ■ Your Distas cost 1 less to summon. They can't cost 0 or less. {SASAGALE} 1 (While summoning a Dispector, you may reduce its cost by 1. If you do, destroy this creature. That Dispector can't cost less than 0.)
